SlifCRET./'Yom Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, ' 9th September 1918.(Received at India Office, IOth, 7.30 a.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier reports severe but undecisive lighting between lashkars of Bajaur Mullahs and Khan Khar, Elsewhere frontier quiet.
